org.guicebox.failover
Interface Transport

All Known Implementing Classes:
UdpTransport
public interface Transport

Interface to the physical transport layer for broadcast distribution of Heartbeats to other nodes on the network.

Author:
willhains

Method Summary
 void disconnect()
          Clean up connections used in the transport of heartbeats.
 Heartbeat receive(Heartbeat ownHeartbeat, int timeout)
          Blocks for the specified number of milliseconds, or until a valid Heartbeat is received from another node in the same cluster.
 void send(Heartbeat hb)
          Broadcasts the specified heartbeat to other nodes in the cluster.
 java.lang.String toString()
           
 

Method Detail

send

void send(Heartbeat hb)
          throws TransportException
Broadcasts the specified heartbeat to other nodes in the cluster.

Throws:
TransportException - if an error occurs while sending (wraps real cause of error).

receive

Heartbeat receive(Heartbeat ownHeartbeat,
                  int timeout)
                  throws TransportException,
                         java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException
Blocks for the specified number of milliseconds, or until a valid Heartbeat is received from another node in the same cluster.

Parameters:
ownHeartbeat - a heartbeat from this node, used to determine whether received heartbeats are from other nodes in the same cluster.
timeout - how many milliseconds to wait before timing out.
Returns:
the heartbeat that was received.
Throws:
TransportException - if an error occurs while waiting or receiving (wraps real cause of error).
java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException - if the specified timeout expires before a heartbeat is received.

disconnect

void disconnect()
Clean up connections used in the transport of heartbeats. Must tolerate multiple calls. Must swallow any exceptions raised during disconnection.

toString

java.lang.String toString()
Overrides:
toString in class java.lang.Object
Returns:
a short descriptor that can be used in thread names.
